Description.description: o More than 15+ years support and develop Microsoft Dataverse from version 4 up to now. o Experience working with Microsoft Dataverse like develop, code and debug from server side (Plugins, Custom Workflows, Custom Actions, Custom Apis) to client side (JavaScript, TypeScript, PCF), and experienced integrating with others system using SOAP and/or Web API. o Experienced working with Dynamics 365 Apps: Portals, Field Service, Project Service Automation, Unified Service Desk, Omnichannel, and Customer Voice. o For ERP related, experienced with integration between Microsoft Dataverse with Dynamics AX 2012, Dynamics 365 Operations, focusing on data integration of accounts related, invoice related, sales order related. o Familiar and experienced with various business domains such as food and beverage, information technology, plastic, and eCommerce. o I am the first individual publisher in Vietnam released a commercial Microsoft Dataverse add-on to AppSource: Icons and Tooltips with D365 - Allow you customize your Microsoft Dataverse grid/subgrid with your icons and tooltips without any helps from your developer. ( https://d365iconsandtooltips.com, https://appsource.microsoft.com/en-us/product/dynamics365/phuocle.d365-icons-and-tooltips ) o Github released DynamicsCrm.DevKit - a Visual Studio extension - that helps Microsoft Dataverse developer can easily develop. ( https://github.com/phuocle/Dynamics-Crm-DevKit ) o Github released View-FetchXML - a managed solution that helps Microsoft Dataverse developer easy copy/paste FetchXML code. ( https://github.com/phuocle/View-FetchXML ) o Github released Dataverse Dialog Builder - a managed solution Microsoft Dataverse developer easy build the dialog like OOB dialog. ( https://github.com/phuocle/Dataverse-Dialog-Builder ) o When I have free time, I write Microsoft Dataverse articles on my personal blog. ( https://phuocle.net )
